hero.title: Secure Your Ideal Residential Property When You Rent House in Sector 50 Gurgaon Today
description: Sector 50 in Gurgaon represents the pinnacle of urban residential living offering a perfect blend of luxury convenience and connectivity. If you are looking to rent house in Sector 50 you are choosing a locality known for its sprawling independent houses elegant builder floors and premium gated communities. This sector is strategically positioned close to the Golf Course Extension Road making daily commutes seamless while providing immediate access to the city’s finest dining retail and entertainment options.

We understand that finding the right rental property requires local expertise and dedication. Our curated listings feature verified properties ranging from compact sophisticated apartments to expansive luxury villas designed for comfortable family living. Start your search now to explore why Sector 50 is the preferred destination for professionals and families seeking a high-quality lifestyle in the heart of New Gurgaon. Let us help you find the perfect place to call home among the prestigious houses available for rent in Sector 50 Gurgaon.

featuresSection.heading: Diverse Rental Property Configurations and House Types Available in Sector 50 Gurgaon
description: Sector 50 offers a remarkable diversity in housing options catering to different family sizes and budget requirements. While many choose luxury apartments there is a significant demand for independent floors and houses built on various plot sizes offering more privacy and space. Understanding the typical configuration associated with these plot sizes helps narrow down your search when you look to rent house in Sector 50.

From compact independent floors ideal for young professionals to majestic villas suitable for large families or expatriates Sector 50 ensures quality construction and excellent community infrastructure. Discover the unique residential offerings based on the plot size footprint below ensuring you select a property that matches your exact spatial and lifestyle needs.

features.title: 4 Marla Plot House Rentals
features.description: Houses built on 4 Marla plots typically translate into sophisticated 2 BHK or compact 3 BHK independent floors. These properties are often preferred by nuclear families or executives seeking a modern low-maintenance rental property. They offer high-end finishes and superior security making them an excellent entry point into the Sector 50 lifestyle without committing to the size of a full villa or large independent house.

features.title: 6 Marla Plot House Rentals
features.description: The 6 Marla footprint often hosts spacious 3 BHK builder floors or smaller duplex units. These rentals strike a perfect balance between space and affordability providing ample room for a growing family. You will find that houses for rent in Sector 50 on this size plot boast good ventilation dedicated parking and access to the superb community amenities expected in this area of Gurgaon.

features.title: 8 Marla Plot House Rentals
features.description: Properties on 8 Marla plots commonly feature large 3 BHK or even 4 BHK independent houses and high-end builder floor apartments. These are designed for those requiring significant living space dedicated staff quarters and perhaps small private gardens or terraces. Renting an 8 Marla house ensures a premium private living experience surrounded by Sector 50’s manicured streetscapes and secure environment.

features.title: 10 Marla Plot House Rentals
features.description: When you rent house in Sector 50 on a 10 Marla plot you are entering the realm of luxury independent kothis and spacious duplex residences. These homes are typically designed with grand architectural details superior fixtures and extensive woodwork. Ideal for large joint families or high-level executives these rentals offer unparalleled privacy and expansive entertaining areas within a prestigious locale.

features.title: 12 Marla Plot House Rentals
features.description: Houses built on 12 Marla plots provide substantial residential scale often featuring independent villas or grand multi-story residences. These properties are synonymous with ultra-luxury living offering multiple living rooms large kitchens and often private elevators. If you prioritize space exclusivity and status renting a 12 Marla house in Sector 50 offers a top-tier residential experience rarely matched.

features.title: 14 Marla Plot House Rentals
features.description: The 14 Marla configuration is reserved for the largest and most luxurious independent bungalows and customized residences in Sector 50. These colossal homes often include dedicated entertainment zones basement parking and extensive landscaping. Securing one of these rare rentals is an opportunity for those demanding the utmost in space luxury and bespoke high-end living in the heart of Gurgaon.

locationsSection.title: Discover Key Housing Communities and Societies Near Sector 50 Gurgaon

The rental market here is robust supported by world-class infrastructure and proximity to major business hubs. Understanding the surrounding landscape is crucial when deciding exactly where to rent house in Sector 50 or adjacent prime locations.

The sector benefits hugely from its position near the Golf Course Extension Road connecting it effortlessly to Sector 55 56 and the main arterial roads leading to NH-48. This strategic placement ensures that whether you choose a house within a well-known society or an independent floor you remain connected to top schools shopping centres and major employment zones.

whyChoose.title: Eight Compelling Reasons to Rent House in Sector 50 Gurgaon
description: Sector 50 stands out as one of Gurgaon's most desirable residential locales offering a premium lifestyle and exceptional convenience. Choosing to rent a house here means securing a home in a location renowned for its security planning and infrastructural superiority. It is a sector built for discerning residents who prioritize quality of life.

From excellent connectivity to high safety standards and immediate access to necessities Sector 50 provides a holistic living environment. Explore the primary benefits that make this sector the ideal choice for your next rental residence in Gurgaon.

points.title: Unmatched Connectivity to Golf Course Road
points.description: Sector 50 provides direct and easy access to the prestigious Golf Course Extension Road a major artery in Gurgaon. This ensures quick travel times to Cyber City MG Road and other crucial business districts. This superior connectivity saves commuting time making it highly attractive for professionals looking to rent house in Sector 50 who value efficiency.

points.title: Premium Lifestyle and Gated Security
points.description: The majority of houses and builder floors in Sector 50 are located within or adjacent to well-maintained gated communities like Nirvana Country ensuring 24/7 security surveillance and restricted access. This commitment to safety and privacy creates a peaceful environment highly valued by families and expatriates seeking secure rental properties.

points.title: Access to Top Tier Schools and Hospitals
points.description: Renting in Sector 50 places you minutes away from internationally reputed educational institutions such as DPS International and Amity International School. Furthermore top healthcare facilities like Medanta and Artemis Hospital are easily reachable ensuring that excellent educational and medical infrastructure is always at your fingertips.

points.title: Proximity to Major Corporate Hubs
points.description: Sector 50 is strategically located near major commercial centers and IT parks along the Golf Course Extension Road and Sohna Road. This proximity significantly reduces travel stress for those working in tech finance or corporate management making the decision to rent a house here both practical and advantageous for career growth.

points.title: Diverse Rental Inventory Options
points.description: The sector offers a wide range of rental houses from high-end independent villas and duplexes to meticulously managed builder floors and floors within established societies. This variety ensures that every tenant regardless of budget or space requirement can find a suitable high-quality rental property in Sector 50 Gurgaon.

points.title: Green and Well-Maintained Neighbourhoods
points.description: Sector 50 is known for its well-planned green spaces maintained parks and tree-lined avenues. The emphasis on green infrastructure contributes to a better quality of life promoting outdoor activities and providing a serene escape from the typical urban concrete jungle a significant benefit when you rent a house here.

points.title: Excellent Social Infrastructure Presence
points.description: Residents enjoy immediate access to premium social amenities including The Nirvana Courtyard multiple high-street markets fine dining restaurants and fitness centres. Everything required for a modern comfortable lifestyle is readily available ensuring maximum convenience for Sector 50 renters.

points.title: Long-Term Investment Value and Stability
points.description: While you are renting Sector 50’s reputation for consistent property appreciation and high demand reflects stability in the rental market. This stability ensures that the quality of life and infrastructure you expect will remain consistently high making your tenancy experience predictable and enjoyable.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About How to Rent House in Sector 50 Gurgaon
faqSection.description: Get detailed answers to common inquiries regarding rental procedures costs and lifestyle aspects of living in Sector 50 Gurgaon ensuring you are fully informed before signing your lease.

faqs.question: What is the average rental cost for an independent house or floor in Sector 50
faqs.answer: The average rental cost for independent houses or builder floors in Sector 50 can vary significantly based on the size property age furnishings and exact location within the sector. A standard 3 BHK builder floor might range from INR 35000 to INR 65000 per month while a large independent house or villa could command rents upwards of INR 1 lakh to INR 250 lakh or more. Premium properties near gated communities often fall on the higher end of this scale. It is advisable to consult current market listings for the most accurate pricing when you seek to rent house in Sector 50.

faqs.question: What types of residential properties are commonly available for rent in Sector 50
faqs.answer: Sector 50 primarily offers three main types of residential properties for rent Independent Houses or Kothis Builder Floors and Apartments within large societies like Nirvana Country. Builder floors are particularly popular offering more space and privacy than apartments typically ranging from 2 BHK to spacious 4 BHK layouts. Independent houses are suitable for large families or those seeking maximum exclusivity and often come with private parking and small garden areas.

faqs.question: Is Sector 50 considered a safe neighbourhood for families and expatriates in Gurgaon
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 50 is widely regarded as one of the safest and most secure residential sectors in Gurgaon. Much of the housing stock is situated within well-managed gated communities with multi-layered security protocols including boom barriers CCTV surveillance and dedicated security staff. Its organized layout and general affluence contribute to a low crime rate making it highly favoured by both families and the expatriate community.

faqs.question: What is the typical lease duration accepted by landlords in Sector 50 rental agreements
faqs.answer: The most standard lease duration for rental houses and builder floors in Sector 50 is 11 months renewable upon mutual agreement. However for corporate leases or high-value independent villas landlords often prefer a minimum 12-month or 24-month lock-in period to ensure stability. Tenants should be prepared to pay a security deposit usually equivalent to two to three months' rent upon signing the agreement.

faqs.question: Are maintenance charges included in the rent or paid separately in Sector 50 houses
faqs.answer: For builder floors and independent houses maintenance charges typically cover common area electricity garbage collection and external security which are sometimes included in the quoted rent if minimal. If the house is located within a large society like a villa or apartment complex a separate monthly society maintenance fee is usually applicable and is the responsibility of the tenant unless explicitly stated otherwise in the rental agreement. Always clarify this point before you rent house in Sector 50.

faqs.question: How is the connectivity of Sector 50 to the rest of Gurgaon and Gurgaon NCR
faqs.answer: Connectivity from Sector 50 is excellent. It is directly accessible via the Golf Course Extension Road and benefits from proximity to Sohna Road and the NH-48 leading to Gurgaon. The Huda City Centre Metro Station is a short drive away providing excellent public transport connectivity to various parts of Gurgaon NCR. The sector’s central location makes commuting to Cyber Hub and other major hubs relatively quick.

faqs.question: Are furnished rental properties readily available in Sector 50 or mostly unfurnished
faqs.answer: Both furnished and unfurnished rental properties are available though the majority of independent houses and high-end builder floors are offered in a semi-furnished condition meaning they include modular kitchens wardrobes and essential fixtures. Fully furnished luxury options are available but generally command a substantial premium on the rent. Specify your requirement early on if you need a fully furnished house to streamline your search.

faqs.question: What documentation is typically required to rent a house in Sector 50 Gurgaon as a tenant
faqs.answer: Standard documentation required includes Aadhar Card PAN Card proof of employment or student status passport if you are an expat and current address proof. Landlords typically require copies of these documents along with a completed tenant application form and two passport-sized photographs. A police verification report is mandatory for all tenants residing in Gurgaon properties.

faqs.question: What is the best time of year to secure a good rental deal in Sector 50
faqs.answer: The rental market in Sector 50 remains fairly steady throughout the year due to constant corporate movement. However the slower months immediately following the peak relocation season (which usually ends around July/August) might offer slightly better negotiation opportunities particularly November through January. Aim to start your search 4-6 weeks before your desired move-in date to have maximum inventory to choose from.

faqs.question: Do rental houses in Sector 50 commonly allow pets and what are the policies
faqs.answer: Pet policies vary significantly across individual landlords and societies in Sector 50. While some independent house owners are flexible about allowing small pets properties within large societies often have stricter rules or require a specific pet deposit. It is crucial to confirm the pet policy with the property owner or agent upfront and secure written confirmation to avoid disputes during your tenancy period.
